abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32845733, pmid32852928, pmid32876900, pmid32865241, pmid32652713, pmid32399563, pmid32835427, pmid32838945, pmid32804187, pmid32810303, pmid32703420, pmid32810218, pmid32871003, pmid32841356, pmid32845869, pmid32790653, pmid32813543
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.09.08
